outputs.output_descr:
The main outcome of the PDF A project is a project document for a MSP of 2 to 4 years, with the following 4 key outputs:
•	Capacity Building at all levels (local-national)
•	NAP and medium term investment plan completed.
•	SLM mainstreamed into development, with greater donor/government allocations/interest.
•	A simple pilot model intervention that focuses on capacity and mainstreaming.

The expected goal of the final project is to finalize the NAP for Rwanda and to strengthen the national capacities for Sustainable Land Management.  Its objective is to undertake national-level activities for capacity development and mainstreaming sustainable land management into national development strategies and policies. This objective will be realized through the following outcomes and outputs:

Outcome 1: Individual and institutional capacities for SLM will be enhanced.
Output 1.1:	Training workshops and exchange visits held, for local and national stakeholders.
Output 1.2: 	Awareness raising activities organized around relevant regional, national, sub-national environmental events.
Output 1.3: 	Enhanced institutional structures and functions to better address SLM, at local and national levels.

Outcome 2: 	Systemic capacity building and mainstreaming of SLM principles
Output 2.1: 	Timely completion of high quality NAPs for Rwanda.
Output 2.2: 	SLM principles and NAP priorities integrated into national development strategies to achieve the Millennium Development Goals.
Output 2.3: 	Medium-term Investment Plan

project_title: GEF-PIMS3388 MSP sustainable land management Rwanda
